edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio

Class Sinusoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio.AudioData
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.audio.Sinusoid

  • public class Sinusoid
extends AudioData
    A 16bit, linear SIGNED_PCM, little endian, sinusoid with a sample rate of 8kHz.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sinusoid

        public Sinusoid(double frequency,
                double phase,
                double amplitude,
                double duration)
        Creates a 16bit, linear SIGNED_PCM, little endian, sinusoid with a sample rate of 8kHz.
        Parameters:
        frequency - cycles per second
        phase - phase offset in radians
        amplitude - amplitude
        duration - duration in seconds
